name: football_game_by_kashanshah
author: Kashan Shah

sections.description: This is a very simple football penalty shoot game. It may easily be added to any wordpress site to attract the visitors. The user is allowed to click on the goal are where he/she wants to kick the goal. It’s easy and very simple to add in any page. You just need to copy and paste the shortcode ( [football_game_by_kashanshah] ) on your post and it’s done.
sections.faq:
Does it use any third-party API?

No

Does it requires any customization or editing?

No, it’s very simple. You just need to copy and paste the shortcode on your post and the game will appear.

What is the shortcode to be added on post?

[football_game_by_kashanshah]

short_description: This is a very simple football game. It may easily be added to any wordpress site to attract the visitors as FIFA Wordl Cup 2018 is just here.
